author: JoshPBR2
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds additional DQM tools for the ZDC including

- Timing plots
- TDC plots
- Sum plots
- Emulator plots to be added

#### PR validation:

To test this PR a number of workarounds are needed as this PR is dependent on the ZDC geometry. [see issue](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45530)

To test

`cmsrel CMSSW_14_1_0_pre5
cd CMSSW_14_1_0_pre5/src
cmsenv
git cms-merge-topic matt2275:Test_ZDCRecHit
scram b -j8 `

Grab conditions [here](https://github.com/matt2275/ZDCRecHit-Associated-Files)

This PR will not require any back ports and is intended for heavy-ion data taking.

@salimcerci
title: Added more ZDC functionality to DQM
